documents_dashboard_document_ID_ES: Photocopy of the front and back of your proof of identity (passport, national ID card)
documents_dashboard_document_PROOF_OF_AD: Proof of address with your full name and the address indicated in your profile, dated within the last 3 months (bank statement, utility bill, etc.)
documents_dashboard_document_CORPORATE_I: Updated company TIN card or associated tax documents.
documents_dashboard_document_ADMINISTRAT: Proof of registration of the companyâ€™s social security contributions (national insurance) or similar schemes.
documents_dashboard_document_ASSOCIATION: Copy of notice published in the national gazette or associated supporting document.
documents_dashboard_document_individual_: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (e.g., residential address, change of address)
documents_dashboard_document_corporation: If you are not listed in the trade and companies register or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in the official documentation.
documents_dashboard_document_association: If you are not listed in the certificate of incorporation or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed therein.
documents_dashboard_document_administrat: If you are not listed in the trade and companies register or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in the official documentation.
documents_dashboard_document_other_OTHER: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
